title: 'Critically ill with one of the world's rarest diseases in a remote corner of British Isles'
description: Sky's security and defence editor was left fighting for her life after falling ill with an ultra-rare condition. Today, on aHUS Awareness Day, Deborah Haynes shares her terrifying story - and how the "heroic" efforts of medical teams helped save her from herself.
content:
Paddling in a bay on the tiny Channel Island of Sark, I suddenly felt very sick and cold.
Less than 48 hours later, I was being emergency evacuated to the intensive care unit of a London hospital via cart, tractor, lifeboat, private jet and ambulance... [8145 chars]

title: Claudia Cardinale: Star of The Pink Panther and Once Upon A Time In The West dies aged 87
description: The actress starred in more than 100 films and made-for-TV productions, but considered 1966's The Professionals as the best of her Hollywood roles.
content:
Acclaimed Italian actress Claudia Cardinale, who starred in The Pink Panther and Once Upon A Time In The West, has died aged 87, according to French media reports.
The actress, who starred in more than 100 films and made-for-TV productions, died in N... [1348 chars]

title: Leeds NHS trust forced to repay £5m over maternity failings
description: Leeds NHS Trust was paid the money after claiming services met safe standards of care.
content:
An NHS trust at the centre of concerns over its poor maternity services has had to repay almost £5m after wrongly claiming it provided safe care to mothers and their babies.
Leeds Teaching Hospitals NHS Trust was paid the money after saying its servi... [3847 chars]

title: 'West going to hell' and 'Kate and William's support' for Southport
description: Trump's UN speech and the visit of the Prince and Princess of Wales to Southport make Wednesday's headlines.
content:
US President Donald Trump's attack on European countries at the UN is on most of the front pages. The Financial Times, external calls it a "tirade" while for the Daily Mirror, external it was a "deranged" rant.

title: I'm an alcoholic. I kept it from a lot of people
description: The Shout singer reveals her secret struggle with drink - and how she's stayed sober for 12 years.
content:
Lulu: Telling the world I'm an alcoholic was liberating
4 hours ago
Mark SavageMusic Correspondent
"My name is Lulu. I am an alcoholic."
It's a startling way to open an interview, even if you know it's coming.
